hero.base-heading: AUCTIONS THAT DONT HAVE NOTHING CLASSIC
hero.base-body: Bids&Classics is a cultural community that dynamically promotes the art collecting and the talent of artists, thanks to a technological support that allows us to encourage the diffusion of art by creating a solid bond of trust. Through our auctions, we are able to connect new audiences to an ever-growing international art market.

mobile.base-section-heading-inner-text: Bids&Classics is a platform that seeks to consolidate art collecting and culture, making available to foundations and cultural enterprises and collectors, a software that can register works of art in the international art market.
features: Online silent auctions or Live Stream

cards.title: Hybrid auctions
cards.text: If you’re looking at a complete event, we organize your auction from A to Z. It will be physical and elaborated around silent bids thanks to the collector’s smartphones.

cards.title: Online auction
cards.text: We compose the integrality of the online art auction thanks to an unique software, very intuitive and adapted to the challenges of the art market.

cards.title: Solo platform
cards.text: You already have the artworks ? You can choose between two options to enjoy our platform : the Silent Auction or the Live Stream, so you can place your brand on the virtual art market.
